name: Muskaan-Parents Association for the Empowerment of Persons with Intellectual Disability
briefDescription: Muskaan, established in 1982, is a voluntary organisation of parents and professionals that has grown into one of New Delhi’s premier institute providing comprehensive education, vocational training and work opportunities to young people with intellectual challenge. Collective will, determination, unwavering optimism, and also relentless hardwork, honest intentions and clarity of focus has steered the growth of Muskaan.Muskaan was established with  threefold objective :•	Provide comprehensive education and training including vocational training and work opportunities for persons with intellectual disability•	Empower the parents through emotional support, appropriate information and understanding of the development needs of the chilodren•	Raise awareness in the society about the capacities of persons with intellectual disability and advocate for their rights
